actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill entitled "The State Legislative and Administrative Procedure Protection Act of 1980".
short_title: State Legislative and Administrative Procedure Protection Act of 1980

summary.text: State Legislative and Administrative Procedure Protection Act of 1980 - Requires any final rule promulgated by the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency which would nullify any State law or administrative procedure to be transmitted to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation of the Senate and the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce of the House of Representatives. Prohibits such a rule from becoming effective if either House passes a resolution disapproving it within 30 days of continuous session after it is transmitted to such committees.

titles.title: State Legislative and Administrative Procedure Protection Act of 1980
A bill entitled "The State Legislative and Administrative Procedure Protection Act of 1980".
